name: FINDING_TEXT_GEN_SUMMARY
description: This table contains the generated summary text that is associated with a particular finding.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the generated summary text information associated with this finding. Together with FINDING_ID, this forms the foreign key to the FINDING_TEXT_GEN table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple generated summary text values associated with the finding and the item from the FINDING_TEXT_GEN table.

columns.name: SUMMARY_TEXT
columns.description: The generated summary text that is associated with a particular finding.
